section.title: PortGroup python & python2x
section.para: PortGroup python allows for efficient porting of python-based open source software.

section.title: python PortGroup Specific Variables
section.para: When the python PortGroup is declared within a Portfile, the following variables are provided during port install.

listitem.para: The Python dynamic library and path (ie, ${prefix}/lib/libpython2.x.dylib).
Path to the Python include directory.
Path to the Python site-packages directory. (ie, ${prefix}/lib/python2.4/site-packages).
